channel.title: Scala on Mailund on the Internet
channel.description: Recent content in Scala on Mailund on the Internet

item.title: Giving Scala a Go—Playing with Lists
item.description: Soon, I will be unemployed — the needs of Kvantify and my interests and qualifications have diverged over the last year — so it is time to brush up on my skills, so I look interesting for potential future employer. Since I don’t know what a future employer will be looking for, this mainly means finding something I’m not familiar with but interested in and playing with it. Today, the choice fell on Scala.
